reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits true to size with perfect length and arm measurements, and appreciate its nice quality and durability.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I SERIOUSLY LOVE THESE!
items.body: I fell in love with this sweater with my first one, which was the black one. I purchased it in my usual size of XL, then when I went to buy my next in the Army green color, the XL wasn't available, so I went with L, and it fit great. Since then, I have ordered 5 more in the L size, for a total of 7 and then today I went ahead and ordered 2 more. So, I am telling you these are fantastic and beautiful sweaters. I feel great in all of them, even the white and the apricot (which is a slightly darker cream color), as lighter colors on top usually make me feel like a marshmallow, but I feel pretty in them. For reference I am 5'4", 195 lbs, 44" bust, 40" waist, and 45" hip. So, I am right at the cusp of the L and XL size. I did have to return the dark brown sweater as the L seemed to be a bit snug, so not sure if this was just a faulty label job or if it was cut incorrectly, so I just reordered it in the XL size - the XL came in and it feels more like the L should have fit, so you might want order on the side of caution and size up in that color only. I deal with hot flashes quite a bit and so sweaters are not necessarily my friend, but these sweaters are just perfect. They feel great to the touch as well as while wearing. They are soft and light weight so great if you tend to overheat like I do. There is stretch to the fabric as you would expect with a sweater material. The fabric feels like great quality and as long as you take care of it should last for many years. I have already washed (in cold) and layed flat to dry the black one and I have not noticed any shrinking and perhaps the material feels even softer. I didn't see any pilling, but it does seem slightly fuzzier, so perhaps hand washing would be the best option. Because I am so smitten with these sweaters I will definitely say they are a great value for the money, but I have found that I was able to get just about all that I wanted on a sale price as I was able to go between the two different sizes. I feel that I have to mention this, on the green, black and white striped version, I can see the white stitching thread at the underarm seam. I do not usually put my arms up all the way, so I probably won't do anything about it, as I know that it is just because they sewed this sweater with all white thread and this is a seam that does get pulled and tugged at. If I think it will bother me in the future, I will use black thread and tighten up that seam a bit, so it no longer is an issue. At first, I thought the seam was coming loose, but it isn't. Also to note that on all the sweaters I ordered that have stripes, all the stripes line up which is something that doesn't usually happen so these just feel like even better quality. The red one is almost a true red, perhaps slightly towards a candy apple red, it is a shade of red I am very happy with, and I am a red color snob. The A-Brown color looks like it should be an orangish-brown on my screen, but in real life I would call it more of a caramel color. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Cozy, and Perfect
items.body: This pullover is everything I didn’t know I needed! It’s unbelievably soft—like being hugged by a cloud—and ridiculously comfortable for lounging, running errands, or just chilling at home. The fit is relaxed but flattering, and the long sleeves keep me cozy without feeling bulky. Honestly, I may never want to take it off. Soft, comfy, and effortlessly cute—my new go-to top for basically everything! Read more
items.author: Marie Thornton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Long Sweater
items.body: This shirt was longer than I expected but it’s cute and comfortable and was priced decently enough for me not to be concerned if I get it dirty at work. Read more
items.author: Sarah M. Berry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater
items.body: This sweater is soft and cozy! I got the white. It’s slightly more off white. I love the details! The oversized fit is cute without looking frumpy! I love that you can dress it up or down. It washes nicely. It’s lightweight, but still keeps you warm! Read more
items.author: Michele Richards

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater, great price!
items.body: Sweater is cute, soft, good fit, pretty color. Read more
items.author: Alyssa K.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Versatile sizing check required
items.body: The material was nice, however the sizing was very off, I chose a small, and had a baby four months ago and it was still quite wide at the mid waist even tucked in, fabric is soft, and it would have great versatility for holidays to work with a shirt underneath, Read more
items.author: Catrina Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute
items.body: So cute and comfy. Fits as expected. One of the better clothing items I've ordered on Amazon. Nice quality. Read more
items.author: Kenzie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and lightweight
items.body: This sweater is surprisingly soft and lightweight—I wore it with a tank underneath. The colors are true and it looks very nice. I will say, this particular style was weirdly long at the waist and I did end up flipping it up under at the bottom to make it fit more flattering. I'm 5'7" and 115lbs, the small fit me loose, but still looks nice. The sleeves are nice and long too - which is my preference. It washed well, I did lay it out to dry as instructed, but I threw it in with another load (after it was already dry) to fluff it up. Read more
items.author: Kadiebug

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-dark Apricot, A-white, A-black, A-khaki, A-baby Blue, Stripe 1, Mocha Brown+black, Beige+pink+gray, A-army Green, A-dark Purple, Colorblock 284, Pat1, A-red, Colorblock 458. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
